intro: ^, it's so nice to see you! How's your day going?"

s: ^It's nice to see you too! I've been pretty good. How about yourself?

Chat1: ^Elisa?Smiling "I'm well! I have a lot going on. So many of moving pieces to get in order before the next school year, you know?"
^Elisa?Smiling "The transition from Bloomwood Community College to a state school is exciting, but stressful too! What's new with you?"

s: ^It sounds like you have a lot on your plate.
^I totally get it. Hey, there's something I wanted to ask you.

Chat2: ^Elisa?Smiling "I need to figure out a way to pay for these textbooks. School can be so expensive! Maybe I can get a part-time job, but I'm not sure where."

s: ^I'm sorry to hear that. School is already stressful enough.
^I may have a solution to that if you're interested?

Chat3: ^Elisa?Smiling "It's okay, I still have a few weeks to come up with a plan. So I don't have to enter panic mode just yet!"
^Elisa?Smiling "I'm nothing if not resourceful. Some combination of patience and persistence will get me there, right?"

s: ^Actually, I think I might have a solution for you!
^There's a part-time opening at the library. I think you're a perfect fit!

c-0: ^The library is looking for an extra set of hands in the YA section. Interested

Explain2: ^Elisa?Smiling "That's definitely up my alley! I was afraid I'd end up waiting tables, or worse... I spent a summer as an assistant for a dog groomer."
^Elisa?Smiling "It was pretty filthy, but maybe I'm biased since I'm a cat person. I was starting to think I'd have to go back to that."
^Elisa?Smiling "I love the library, and I really like Rashad. I'd love to learn more."

s: ^Rashad posted a job listing on the library's website!

Suggestion1: ^Elisa_Day 1_Elisa will polish up her resume and apply through the library website_Rashad1-1

Suggestion1.#: notification Elisa_Day 1_Elisa_Day 1_Elisa will polish up her resume and apply through the library website_Rashad1-1

Suggestion1: ^Elisa?Smiling "Do they hire students? My school schedule is pretty hectic, but I'll definitely apply. Plus, I love YA fiction."
^Elisa?Smiling "I will polish up my resume and apply as soon as possible! Is resume writing something the library offers a workshop in?"

s: ^I think a student is exactly what Rashad is looking for.
^I'm happy to look over your resume before you apply!

Suggestion2: ^Elisa_Day 1_A part-time job in the library will look good on Elisa's resume_Rashad1-2

Suggestion2.#: notification Elisa_Day 1_A part-time job in the library will look good on Elisa's resume_Rashad1-2

Suggestion2: ^Elisa?Smiling "This sounds like a great way to build up experience, too. I feel like this serves two purposes. It will help me pay for text books, and it'll look great on my resume!"
^Elisa?Smiling "I'm usually free Monday afternoon and on weekends; I hope that's enough to be helpful. How do I apply for the position?"

s: ^That's great to hear! You can apply through the library's website.

Goodbye: ^! I can definitely pull this off. Thanks so much, I really could use the extra cash,"
^Elisa?Smiling "and the process doesn't seem like a hassle. I've got to head to a study session, but I'll see you later!"

s: ^You'll knock it out of the park! Send me that resume when you're ready!
^I can't think of a better candidate! You'll be great!
